filteredArticles.headline: Donation from Howard and Nancy Marks endows Marks Family Center for Excellence in Writing
filteredArticles.abstract: The newly endowed Marks Family Center for Excellence in Writing will engage Penn students and West Philadelphians through writing initiatives and workshops.
